channel.title: Nigel and Trevor's Podcasts
channel.description: Nigel and Trevor episodes for you to carry with you. You lucky bugger.
channel.itunes:author: Brian Howard
channel.itunes:subtitle: All the Nigel and Trevor you want in your pocket.
channel.itunes:summary: British schoolboys Nigel and Trevor stumble their way through life at Simpton School for Boys, one misadventure at a time.

item.title: The World According to Nigel: Episode 2 Site Friennds
item.description: Nigel takes on the Site Friends.

item.title: The World According To Nigel: Episode 1, Tiny Dogs
item.description: The first of an ongoing series bringing you the genius of Nigel. In this issue; Tiny Dogs.
item.itunes:author: Brian Howard
item.itunes:subtitle: Nigel shares with the world his thoughts about tiny dogs.
item.itunes:summary: The first of an ongoing series bringing you the genius of Nigel. In this issue; Tiny Dogs.

item.title: The Big Day
item.description: The Big Day has arrived! The Science Fair that could win the boys a trip to New York and almost certain stardom for Nigel is here. Keep you fingers crossed.
item.itunes:author: Brian Howard
item.itunes:subtitle: The Big Day has arrived! The Science Fair that could win the boys a trip to New York and almost certain stardom for Nigel is here. Keep you fingers crossed.
item.itunes:summary: The Big Day has arrived! The Science Fair that could win the boys a trip to New York and almost certain stardom for Nigel is here. Keep you fingers crossed.

item.title: Choco-Charger 1000
item.description: The boys have to test their experiment and the streets of Simpton will do just fine.

item.title: Science Fair
item.description: Trevor is thrilled when he is paired with Nigel for the upcoming Science Fair. Fortunately Trevor gets to try out his experiment ideas on Nigel.
item.itunes:author: Brian Howard
item.itunes:summary: Trevor is thrilled when he is paired with Nigel for the upcoming Science Fair. Fortunately Trevor gets to try out his experiment ideas on Nigel.

item.title: Blinded With Science
item.description: Nigel fights boredom is science class by tormenting Trevor.
